answers.answer: Being abnormally thirsty all the time and then going to the bathroom a lot because of all of the fluids the person is drinking are two symptoms that can mean diabetes. I would suggest that you ask your parents to take you to a doctor for the simple blood test that will show whether this is the problem or not.
i am 15 somewhere your age.i think you should go see a doctoris your urine foamy?

There are times when I am constantly thirsty and urinate alot because, of the fluids(mainly water) I consume. There are also  times when my urine comes out foamy but my recent blood test showed no trace of an illness. I recommend seeing a doctor, though.
